section.heading: Definitions
section.chapeau: In this part (except chapter 329 and except as provided in section 33101)—

paragraph.chapeau: “bumper standard” means a minimum performance standard that substantially reduces—

subparagraph.content: the damage to the front or rear end of a passenger motor vehicle from a low-speed collision (including a collision with a fixed barrier) or from towing the vehicle; or
the cost of repairing the damage.

paragraph.content: “insurer” means a person in the business of issuing, or reinsuring any part of, a passenger motor vehicle insurance policy.

paragraph.chapeau: “interstate commerce” means commerce between a place in a State and—

subparagraph.content: a place in another State; or
another place in the same State through another State.

paragraph.content: “make”, when describing a passenger motor vehicle, means the trade name of the manufacturer of the vehicle.

subparagraph.content: manufacturing or assembling passenger motor vehicles or passenger motor vehicle equipment; or
importing motor vehicles or motor vehicle equipment for resale.

paragraph.content: “model”, when describing a passenger motor vehicle, means a category of passenger motor vehicles based on the size, style, and type of a make of vehicle.

“motor vehicle” means a vehicle driven or drawn by mechanical power and manufactured primarily for use on public streets, roads, and highways, but does not include a vehicle operated only on a rail line.
“motor vehicle accident” means an accident resulting from the maintenance or operation of a passenger motor vehicle or passenger motor vehicle equipment.
“multipurpose passenger vehicle” means a passenger motor vehicle constructed on a truck chassis or with special features for occasional off-road operation.

paragraph.chapeau: “passenger motor vehicle” means a motor vehicle with motive power designed to carry not more than 12 individuals, but does not include—

subparagraph.content: a truck not designed primarily to carry its operator or passengers.
a system, part, or component of a passenger motor vehicle as originally made;
a similar part or component made or sold for replacement or improvement of a system, part, or component, or as an accessory or addition to a passenger motor vehicle; or
a device made or sold for use in towing a passenger motor vehicle.

paragraph.content: “State” means a State of the United States, the District of Columbia, Puerto Rico, the Northern Mariana Islands, Guam, American Samoa, and the Virgin Islands.

“United States district court” means a district court of the United States, a United States court for Guam, the Virgin Islands, and American Samoa, and the district court for the Northern Mariana Islands.

content.p: There is authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary $9,562,500 for the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration to carry out this part in each fiscal year beginning in fiscal year 1999 and ending in fiscal year 2001.
